publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1324.1 Tommy Sheridan: NHS Governance and Accountability-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1324) in the name of Susan Deacon, insert at end "and further notes that the development and successful implementation of "meaningful and practical proposals for change" requires a clear commitment to involve fully health trade unions, patients' representatives and professional organisations to ensure that improved governance and accountability are properly resourced, democratically agreed and implemented in a spirit of co-operation and not in a culture of blame."
